description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are preparing for a teaching career. Eligibility Requirements Student preparing for a teaching career Undergraduate or Graduate Admitted to Teacher Education Preference given to students who demonstrate financial need Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee 2 scholarships for music education majors and 2 scholarships for non-music education majors Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Seniors graduating in December are eligible to receive full scholarship in their last semester Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship
